text: khanditavagiyu nivu avarannu, manavara paiki, badukigagi ati heccu ase paduvavaragi kanuviri. I visayadalli avaru bahudevaradhakarigintalu mundiddare. Avarallina pratiyobbanu savira varsa baduka bayasuttane. Avana a dirgha ayusyavu avanannu sikseyinda raksisalaradu. Allahanu, avaru maduttiruvudannella noduttale iddane
